install.description: How do you over-power a 1000 plus HP engine with dual 4" open exhaust right next to your ear in an open cockpit?

You don't! We opted for just adding a little music while cruising or hanging out. An Alpine 9857 AM/FM CD player with an iPod interface was used as a source, while a pair of JL Audio 6" Speakers where mounted in the kick panels.

An under-dash radio mount was fabricated out of ABS plastic so only the face of the Alpine radio is visible without a trim ring. It also made a new home for the horn button that was tucked under the dash.
Here you see the Merlin engine capable of producing over 1000 HP BEFORE you hit the Nitrous. This is one hairy ride
A look under the drive-train reveals all the attention that went into building this monster T-bucket. Disc brakes, coil-over suspension and lots of chrome.
